cta1.title: Activate your special offer to try Semrush free for 30 days

cases.title: Small businesses deliver big results with Semrush
cases.item-1_title: Smileworks, a Liverpool dental practice, used Semrush digital marketing tools to grow their client base and revenue by 300%
cases.item-1_text: “I’ve never seen a local dental practice in the world ranking as much as we are now. We are ranking nationally. Because of the tool. Simple as that.”
cases.item-2_title: Family bakery used Semrush to rank #1 on Google
cases.item-2_text: “We always dreamed of being our own bosses. Using Semrush, we were able to analyze the market and plan our strategy. Ranking #1 for ‘macarons near me’ was the key to our growth. We’ve sold over 1 million macarons!“
cases.item-3_title: Free fitness site achieved first-ever six figure ad revenue with Semrush
cases.item-3_text: “Using Semrush, I’ve managed to outrank the major fitness magazines for high-volume keywords by being strategic and smart. The tool helped me monetize our website and reach 6-figure ad revenue in 6 months. I wish I had invested in our SEO strategy sooner!”

cta.title: Marketing not your area of expertise? No problem.
cta.subtitle: Semrush’s suite of tools are designed to help you grow
cta.text: Along with your special extended trial, you’ll receive guidance and helpful tips—delivered to your inbox—on how to use Semrush to improve your online visibility and reach more customers.
